summary: This document is a forwarded email chain from August 12, 2019, containing a daily camera status report from the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) Brooklyn. It confirms which surveillance cameras in the West and East buildings were operational, dated August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Datia
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the forwarded email containing the camera report.

persons.name: M.D.C.
persons.context: Identified as the Electronics Technician at MDC Brooklyn who authored or sent the camera status report.

connections.description: Datia forwarded a camera report authored or sent by the Electronics Technician M.D.C.

events.title: Daily Camera Status Report
events.description: An Electronics Technician at MDC Brooklyn sent a report confirming the operational status of specific surveillance cameras in the West Building (K-81, 82, 83, 84, West S.H.U.) and East Building (3-N, 3-S, 3-W, East S.H.U.).

events.title: Report Forwarded
events.description: An individual named Datia forwarded the August 9 camera status report to another recipient.

locations: Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) Brooklyn, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is a forwarded email dated August 12, 2019, containing a camera status report from August 9, 2019.
The report details operational surveillance cameras in the West and East buildings of the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) Brooklyn.
The report was generated by an Electronics Technician identified as 'M.D.C.' at the facility.
